home.subtitle: Learn how to pray the Holy Rosary step by step

steps.title: How to pray the Holy Rosary
steps.intro: The Holy Rosary is a meditative prayer centered in Jesus' and Mother Mary's life. Follow these basic steps:

list.1: Make the Sign of the Cross and pray the Apostles Creed.
list.3: Pray three Hail Marys for faith, hope and charity.
list.5: Announce the first Mystery and pray an Our Father.
list.6: Pray ten Hail Marys while meditating the Mystery.
list.8: Repeat these steps for the five Mysteries.
list.9: When you finish, pray the Hail Holy Queen or another Hail Mary prayer.

signOfCross.title: Sign of the Cross
signOfCross.text: In the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit. Amen.

creed.title: Apostles Creed
creed.text: I believe in God, the Father almighty Creator of heaven and earth; and in Jesus Christ, His only Son, Our Lord...

ourFather.title: Our Father
ourFather.text: Our Father, Who art in heaven, Hallowed be Thy Name...

hailMary.title: Hail Mary
hailMary.text: Hail Mary, Full of Grace, The Lord is with thee...

gloryBe.title: Glory Be
gloryBe.text: Glory be to the Father and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit...

hailHolyQueen.title: Hail Holy Queen
hailHolyQueen.text: Hail Holy Queen Mother of Mercy...
